place.name: GWYNFIL
place.gazetteerText: GWYNFIL, a township in Llanddewi-Brefi parish, Cardigan; near the river Teifi, 4 miles SSW of Tregaron. Acres, 1, 522. Pop., 386. Houses, 84. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
